title: Pulse Glow Neon Watch Face
summary: A glowing watch face that pulses with colors as you tell the time.
description: This is a high quality glowing watch face.  Tell the time with accurate to the millisecond hour, minute and second hands.  The hands are positioned as they would be on a real watch for a better time telling experience.This glowing watch face pulses in an asynchronous manner for a cool effect while reading the time.You can choose from millions of color combinations for your watch hands, the ticks, text and second hand for this glowing watch face.There are two dials which let you choose between day of the week, date and watch battery to display.This glowing and pulsing watch face is sure to satisfy and impress.When downloading this glow watch face, be sure to have Android Wear installed.  It is required to install the watch face on to your smartwatch.
descriptionHTML:
This is a high quality glowing watch face. Tell the time with accurate to the millisecond hour, minute and second hands. The hands are positioned as they would be on a real watch for a better time telling experience.
This glowing watch face pulses in an asynchronous manner for a cool effect while reading the time.
You can choose from millions of color combinations for your watch hands, the ticks, text and second hand for this glowing watch face.
There are two dials which let you choose between day of the week, date and watch battery to display.

This glowing and pulsing watch face is sure to satisfy and impress.

When downloading this glow watch face, be sure to have Android Wear installed. It is required to install the watch face on to your smartwatch.
comments: No refund option You may want to enable the refund option when you're taking money and it's not what the person is looking for. Not a bad watch face but the background I don't care for I prefer a solid black
You can set the colors of the hands, hour ticks and second hand individually, however once you change one it is difficult to get them all back to the same color.
